title: Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Stephen Zatto, Pamela Del Aura, Chuck Richards, Laura Reed Kinney, 1988
title_raw: Review Committee Selections: Stephen Zatto, Pamela Del Aura, Chuck Richards, Laura Reed Kinney
signed: Signature imprinted in black, verso, center: Design: EDWARD FELLa, Bearing the California Republic in the starshine
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black, curving across upper third of sheet: REVIEW COMMITTEE SELECTIONS:; across center: ARTISTS:/ STEVEN ZATTO/ PAMELA DELAURA/ MAY 26-JUNE 25 1988/ CHUCK RICHARDS/ LAURA REED KINNEY; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.; across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; across lower third of sheet: THURSDAY/ OPENING:/ MAY 26 6-8:30P M/ Other openings in the area: Michigan Council for the Arts/ Final Show 87 Grant Recipients/ Opening 4-6:00 P.M./ Detroit Artists Market/ Fber Content Curated by Mollie H. Fletcher/ Oening 5-7:30 P.M./ 1987/*88/ Review Committee/ Pi Benio, Artist/ Educator, Albion College/... [lists Review Committee members, biographic information]... Detroit Institute of Arts/ Closed June 17 and 18 (Grand Prix)
Verso: Imprinted in black across upper third of sheet: the REVIEW COMMITTEE SELECTS; across lower left quadrant: DETROIT/ FOCUS/ GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien, 3rd Floor/ Detroit, Michigan 48226; running upward, sideways: With the support of/ The National Endowment for the Arts/ The Michigan Council for the Arts/ The Detroit Council for the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofit Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, Mich./ Permit No. 2960 

* The "/" is in the text.
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed o be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Across upper third of sheet, text giving exhibtion title curves.  Across center, text giving participating artists and abstract geometric images.  Across lower left edge, text giving location, contact information.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving recetion, juror, and additional information, interspersed with abstarct geometric images.  
Verso: Across center, text giving title ripples over grouping of abstracted objects including a pen, pot, exacto knife.  Across lower third of sheet, sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Review Committee Selections: Stephen Zatto, Pamela Del Aura, Chuck Richards, Laura Reed Kinney, 1988. Offset lithograph on tan paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-24
